attributes.review:
I tried downloading this app to show support for the best president this country has ever seen! Go Amerikkka! 🇱🇷 TRUMPET 2020! 🥳💕 The app took 1850 hours to download and I was so disappointed when I finally got to download it. The graphic design was so ugly and offensive to my eyes, even with Trumpet’s beautiful face on it. 😍 I go through the app to see what it’s all about because I want to show my dutiful support to our AMAZING PRESIDENT, DONNY TRUMPET!!! 🤩 I LOVE HIM! But then the app gave me a bunch of notifications calling me an ugly rat, and saying that I need a spray tan to use the app. I think it’s just really rude to insult someone’s appearance. I cried for a whole week because I couldn’t believe my beloved president was insulting me when I was just trying to lend my support. 😢😔 Then I found out that the app actually tracks your location and now I’m worried that the Trumpet administration might track me down and force me to get a fake tan. People were arguing on the app and when I tried to tell everyone to stop because we’re supposed to be supporting our amazing Donny, they spat on me! This new technology would’ve been impressive if my fellow Magats hadn’t used it to send nasty spit through my phone. 🤢 I’m just so sad because I wanted to love this app and support our amazing president, Donny Trumpet! 🇱🇷 But it looks like I cannot do that so I’m deleting this app and giving it a one star review. I’d give it ZERO STARS if I could! So not worth it!😡
¡Eres asqueroso y estúpido! 😌💖🧚🏻‍♀️✨
